item.title: Workers win tens of thousands in wage case against Melbourne cafe
item.description: <p>Former workers of a popular cafe in Melbourne&#x27;s affluent suburb of Toorak say they are yet to see tens of thousands of dollars they are owed in wages, despite winning a court battle against the owner six months ago.</p>
